name: Accountability
tagline: Ensuring that the AI system is accountable for its impacts
brief: This requirement corroborates all the others by ensuring that AI systems are accountable for their responsible design, implementation, and impact throughout their lifecycle.
description: This requirement ensures responsible development and deployment of generative music AI systems. It includes provisions for auditability, allowing internal and external assessments of the systemâ€™s compliance with responsible AI principles. It also necessitates identifying and mitigating potential negative impacts, making ethical trade-offs when necessary, and redress mechanisms for any unjust adverse impacts.
